overview:
Natalie Sisson is the Co-founder of ConnectionPoint Systems and VP of Marketing and Business Development.

She is passionate about making FundRazr a world-class application that helps make peoples’ lives easier. Together with Founder and friend, Daryl Hatton, she is constantly working on all aspects of the business including product development and promotion, customer and investor relations, social networking integration and partnerships.

Natalie has 8 years experience in marketing, communications, business development and brand/product management both at an operational and strategic level in New Zealand, England and now Canada.

Formerly as Head of Propositions Development for the British Medical Association, Natalie established a business development department for recruiting physicians and produced innovative business products and services for members.

As Product Manager, Refractive Technologies for Bausch and Lomb, she re-launched their entire high tech product platform supporting sales of $50M over the entire EMEA region.

At Schwarzkopf Professional, she resolved the strategic conflicts of competing brand management and marketing programs to channel partners and consumers producing an overall 25% increase in brand sales performance.

She holds a Bachelor of Commerce and a Bachelor of Tourism & Services Management from Victoria University of Wellington, NZ.

She also holds the World Record in dragon boating across The English Channel in 2007, the Gold medal for World Beach Ultimate Frisbee with GB Women in 2007 and gained the title of NZFBB Central North Island Novice Figure Champion in body sculpting in 2004.
